script:
1). Did you hear about the first edition book that sold for a million dollars last week?
I usually buy paperbacks rather than hardback ones.
All the walls in my living room are covered in bookshelves.
Yes, I did. I keep hoping I'll come across a rare book that's worth a lot of money. 
2). Someone told me that in some countries the parents have to pay for their children's schoolbooks.
Yes, I heard about that. It just shows how lucky we are in this country. 
No, I spend very little on books really.
I spend all my money on newspapers.
3). Is it true that you pay less for your meal if you come here on Tuesdays?
I don't mind if we don't eat anything today.
Yes, that's right but it has to be between 12 and 3. 
I believe today is Wednesday, isn't it?
